name: PurPLL
details:
Phase Locked LoopThe PURPLL is a phase-locked-loop (PLL) type pedal. It can be used as a fuzzed out harmonizer, drone synth and more.
Check out the videos below and the manual linked here  for more details. And yes, the backplates are dated 2017/2018 because that is the year we started making them. (:


https://mtlasm.com/product/test/
